name: InfluxDB 3.0 Source
shortDescription: Use the InfluxDB 3.0 query API to periodically query InfluxDB and publish the results to a Kafka topic.

Variables.Name: output
Variables.Description: The Kafka topic that will receive the query results

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_HOST
Variables.Description: Host address for the InfluxDB instance.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_DATABASE
Variables.Description: Database name in InfluxDB where data is stored.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_QUERY_MEASUREMENTS
Variables.Description: The measurements to query. If left None, all measurements will be processed.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_RECORD_KEY_COLUMN
Variables.Description: The InfluxDB record column used for the Kafka message key, else uses the measurement's name.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_RECORD_TIMESTAMP_COLUMN
Variables.Description: The InfluxDB record column used for the Kafka timestamp, else uses Kafka default (produce time).

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_RECORD_MEASUREMENT_COLUMN
Variables.Description: The column name used for inserting the measurement name, else uses '_measurement'.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_QUERY_SQL
Variables.Description: A custom SQL query to use for retrieving data from InfluxDB, else uses default.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_QUERY_START_DATE
Variables.Description: The RFC3339-formatted start time for querying InfluxDB, else uses current runtime.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_QUERY_END_DATE
Variables.Description: The RFC3339-formatted end time for querying InfluxDB, else runs indefinitely for 1 measurement only.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_QUERY_TIME_DELTA
Variables.Description: Time interval for batching queries, e.g., '5m' for 5 minutes.

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_QUERY_MAX_RETRIES
Variables.Description: Maximum number of retries for querying or producing (with multiplicative backoff).

Variables.Name: INFLUXDB_QUERY_DELAY_SECONDS
Variables.Description: Add an optional delay (in seconds) between producing batches.

Variables.Name: CONSUMER_GROUP_NAME
Variables.Description: The name of the consumer group to use when consuming from Kafka.

Variables.Name: BUFFER_SIZE
Variables.Description: The number of records that sink holds before flush data to InfluxDb.

Variables.Name: BUFFER_TIMEOUT
Variables.Description: The number of seconds that sink holds before flush data to the InfluxDb.
